success.sendEmail: The access code has been sent to your email.

warning.userPendingVerification: The account is pending verification. We've sent you an email so you can activate it.

error.incorrectCode: The code you provided does not match the expected code.
error.technicalSupport: There is a problem trying to activate your account, please contact support.

activateUserAccount.success: Your account has been successfully activated. You will be redirected shortly

warning.activated: Your account has already been activated.
warning.codeExpired: The code has expired. A new access code has been sent to your email address..

error.accessCodeIsInvalid: The access code is invalid. Check your email and verify what the last code provided was.

signIn.success: Welcome, you will be redirected soon.

warning.accessCodeHasExpired: The access code has expired. We have sent you an email with a new access code.

error.alreadyRegisteredEmail: An account has already been created with this email address.

signUp.success: Successfully created account. Account created successfully. We have sent an email with an activation code.

warning.alreadyRegisteredUsername: There is already an account created with this username.

error.pendingVerification: Cannot update because the user is in pending verification status
error.userInactive: Cannot update because the user is in inactive status.
